books.title: Betwixt
books.publisher: Published by Quill & Flame Publishing House
books.logline: Devastated by the sudden death of her mother, a socially anxious teen returns to her birthplace of Ketchikan, Alaska, where she must uncover the truth about her newfound magical abilities tied to the forest and her mother's veiled past before the powers governing the forest destroy her.

shortStories.title: Blackthorn and Holly
shortStories.detail: Featured in the Seasons of Romantasy anthology
shortStories.publisher: Published by Quill & Flame Publishing House
